title: The 2019 Elections: What To Watch For
description: It's an off, off, off election year, but some states will still be casting votes. NPR Politics breaks down the key races to watch.  This episode: White House correspondent Tamara Keith, political reporter Jessica Taylor, and senior editor and correspondent Domenico Montanaro. Email the show at nprpolitics@npr.org. Find and support your local public radio station at npr.org/stations.
